name: Hyperlydian
description: Original hyperlydian scale with maximum brightness, no alterations.

name: Modified Lydian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by lowering the 1st degree by 1 step. Contains augmented intervals.

name: QuasiMicrotonal Lydian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps. Contains microtonal intervals.

name: QuasiMicrotonal Lydian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps and lowering the 4th degree by 1 step. Results in a scale with highly varied intervals. Contains microtonal intervals.

name: QuasiMicrotonal Lydian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps and flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps. Contains microtonal intervals.

name: QuasiMicrotonalUltra Lydian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, and lowering the 7th degree by 1 step. Results in a scale with highly varied intervals. Contains microtonal intervals.

name: QuasiMicrotonalUltra Lydian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, and flattening the 7th degree by 2 steps. Contains microtonal intervals.

name: QuasiMicrotonalUltra Aeolian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, and diminishing the 7th degree by 3 steps. Results in a scale with highly varied intervals. Contains microtonal intervals.

name: QuasiMicrotonalUltra Aeolian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, and severely diminishing the 7th degree by 4 steps. Contains microtonal intervals.

name: QuasiMicrotonalUltra Aeolian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, lowering the 3rd degree by 1 step, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, and severely diminishing the 7th degree by 4 steps. Results in a scale with highly varied intervals. Contains microtonal intervals.

name: QuasiMicrotonalUltra Ionian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, flattening the 3rd degree by 2 steps, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, and severely diminishing the 7th degree by 4 steps. Contains microtonal intervals.

name: QuasiMicrotonalUltra Ionian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, diminishing the 3rd degree by 3 steps, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, and severely diminishing the 7th degree by 4 steps. Results in a scale with highly varied intervals. Contains microtonal intervals.

name: QuasiMicrotonalUltra Ionian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, severely diminishing the 3rd degree by 4 steps, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, and severely diminishing the 7th degree by 4 steps. Contains microtonal intervals.

name: QuasiMicrotonalUltra Ionian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, severely diminishing the 3rd degree by 4 steps, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, lowering the 6th degree by 1 step, and severely diminishing the 7th degree by 4 steps. Results in a scale with highly varied intervals. Contains microtonal intervals.

name: QuasiMicrotonalUltra Ionian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, severely diminishing the 3rd degree by 4 steps, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, flattening the 6th degree by 2 steps, and severely diminishing the 7th degree by 4 steps. Contains microtonal intervals.

name: QuasiMicrotonalUltra Phrygian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, severely diminishing the 3rd degree by 4 steps, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, diminishing the 6th degree by 3 steps, and severely diminishing the 7th degree by 4 steps. Results in a scale with highly varied intervals. Contains microtonal intervals.

name: QuasiMicrotonalUltra Phrygian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, severely diminishing the 3rd degree by 4 steps, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, severely diminishing the 6th degree by 4 steps, and severely diminishing the 7th degree by 4 steps. Contains microtonal intervals.

name: QuasiMicrotonalUltra Phrygian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, lowering the 2nd degree by 1 step, severely diminishing the 3rd degree by 4 steps, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, severely diminishing the 6th degree by 4 steps, and severely diminishing the 7th degree by 4 steps. Results in a scale with highly varied intervals. Contains microtonal intervals.

name: QuasiMicrotonalUltra Phrygian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, flattening the 2nd degree by 2 steps, severely diminishing the 3rd degree by 4 steps, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, severely diminishing the 6th degree by 4 steps, and severely diminishing the 7th degree by 4 steps. Contains microtonal intervals.

name: NeutralQuasiMicrotonalUltra Mixolydian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, diminishing the 2nd degree by 3 steps, severely diminishing the 3rd degree by 4 steps, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, severely diminishing the 6th degree by 4 steps, and severely diminishing the 7th degree by 4 steps. Contains microtonal intervals.

name: QuasiMicrotonalUltra Mixolydian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, severely diminishing the 2nd degree by 4 steps, severely diminishing the 3rd degree by 4 steps, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, severely diminishing the 6th degree by 4 steps, and severely diminishing the 7th degree by 4 steps. Contains microtonal intervals.

name: QuasiMicrotonalUltra Mixolydian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, maximally diminishing the 2nd degree by 5 steps, severely diminishing the 3rd degree by 4 steps, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, severely diminishing the 6th degree by 4 steps, and severely diminishing the 7th degree by 4 steps. Results in a scale with highly varied intervals. Contains microtonal intervals.

name: SuperSemi Mixolydian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, maximally diminishing the 2nd degree by 5 steps, severely diminishing the 3rd degree by 4 steps, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, lowering the 5th degree by 1 step, severely diminishing the 6th degree by 4 steps, and severely diminishing the 7th degree by 4 steps. Contains consecutive semitones.

name: Modified Mixolydian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, maximally diminishing the 2nd degree by 5 steps, severely diminishing the 3rd degree by 4 steps, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, flattening the 5th degree by 2 steps, severely diminishing the 6th degree by 4 steps, and severely diminishing the 7th degree by 4 steps. Contains augmented intervals.

name: Neutral Mixolydian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, maximally diminishing the 2nd degree by 5 steps, severely diminishing the 3rd degree by 4 steps, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, diminishing the 5th degree by 3 steps, severely diminishing the 6th degree by 4 steps, and severely diminishing the 7th degree by 4 steps. Contains augmented intervals.

name: Modified Locrian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, maximally diminishing the 2nd degree by 5 steps, severely diminishing the 3rd degree by 4 steps, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, severely diminishing the 5th degree by 4 steps, severely diminishing the 6th degree by 4 steps, and severely diminishing the 7th degree by 4 steps. Contains augmented intervals.

name: SuperSemi Locrian
description: Derived from hyperlydian by flattening the 1st degree by 2 steps, maximally diminishing the 2nd degree by 5 steps, severely diminishing the 3rd degree by 4 steps, flattening the 4th degree by 2 steps, maximally diminishing the 5th degree by 5 steps, severely diminishing the 6th degree by 4 steps, and severely diminishing the 7th degree by 4 steps. Contains consecutive semitones.
